t: An Ode to Loma Linda, the Canned Vegan Meat Brand That Almost Made It | VegNews
s: 1 week ago - A remembrance of Loma Linda, the Adventist-rooted canned vegan meat brand that stocked co-op shelves for decades, offering a glimpse of a gentler food future—one that may now be fading from view.
